Articles.Content: Im not sure if its suppost to be asked on this forum... however - I see people like Scott Manley and many other use stuff such as MysteryGoo and reuse it again and again, (transmit and then reuse)... Im trying to do so aswell, but I cant O.o when I right click to do science again (after transmiting the current result) its just dont let me do anything ... saying only temperature... any idea why is it like that? how can I fix it?

Hi Niv, the Goo was changed a while back from infinite reuses to having to be reset by the lab module.

You need to dock the craft with the Goo to the craft with the Lab though, or carry the Lab around with you.

This is also true for the Science Jr.
Yeah, so people would stop milking the poor Goo's udder. They had to eat so much grass to produce that Science...
Thanks guys, but I did saw scott manley use it in one of hes last episodes of KSP, is there anyway to change it? Id like to play easy-mode since Im a bit new to this game

Use a lab! They allow you to both refurbish the experiments and decrease the science loss from transmitting.

It's better to bring all kerbals home anyways.
Thanks, Ive mistaken about Scott Manley haha, was old episode, ty all!
